item.title: Prayer bpn13483 in Chichewa
item.description: Ulemelero ukhale kwa Inu, O Mulungu wanga! Indetu, wantchito Wanuyu ndi mdzakazi Wanuyu asonkhana pansi pa m’thunzi wa chifundo Chanu ndipo agwirizana kubzolera muchifundo ndi kuolowa manja Kwanu. O Ambuye! Athandizeni iwo m’dziko Lanu lino ndi Muufumu Wanu ndipo akonzeleni iwo zabwino zonse kubzolera mu chaulere ndi chisomo Chanu. O Ambuye! Alimbikitseni iwo mkukutumikirani ndipo athandizeni mu ntchito Yanu. Muwapange iwo kukhala zizindikiro za Dzina Lanu mdziko Lanu ndipo atetezeni iwo kubzolera mu mphatso Zanu zimene siziguga mu dziko lino ndi mu dziko lirinkudza.
